name: Bridge quest
description:
This game is a submission for the gba game jam 2021.

You need a Gameboy Advance emulator or a real Gameboy Advance with a flashcard to play this game.

In this game you have to find the way to the desert.

Enemys and an evil tree boss will try to stop you.

Controls:

Arrow keys:  Movement

A: use sword

B: block enemys with shield

Source Code:
https://github.com/fixxiefixx/BridgeQuestGBA

Credits:

This game is made with Butano Engine: https://github.com/GValiente/butano

Programming:

fixx
